productName: J&J Flumax All in One Tablets

nodes.name: Instruction (simple)
nodes.notes: A simple instruction with just a prompt.

nodes.name: Addition
nodes.notes: Allows selection of an Addition method

nodes.name: Discharge
nodes.notes: Allows selection of a Discharge method

nodes.name: Weigh Consume
nodes.notes: Prompt the user to add a pre-weighed bag of material into the specified container/equipment

nodes.name: Print Label
nodes.notes: Prompt the user to print a label

nodes.name: Scan Weighing
nodes.notes: Prompts the user to scan any pre-weighed bag

nodes.name: Weigh Info
nodes.notes: Displays information about the last bag scanned

nodes.name: Identify Weighing
nodes.notes: Allows user to identify a weighing for a specific component

nodes.name: Identify Container
nodes.notes: Allow entry of container serial number

nodes.name: Identify Equipment
nodes.notes: Allow entry of equipment serial number
